Html:
I just wondered if anybody was working on a Box2D declarations file?  

Or even better, a reconversion from the original C++ code to TypeScript.

I recently started one here -> https://github.com/jbaldwin/box2dweb.d.ts

It is considerably larger than I expected... might be a while still.

First of all, thanks for taking the trouble of writing the TypeScript definition files. It must've been lots of work.

As an exercise I've ported a project of mine from JS to TypeScript but I run into a problem with box2dweb. My TypeScript compiles without any problems but when I run the code I get the following message: Uncaught ReferenceError: b2Dynamics is not defined.

I am not quite sure how to fix this and I was hoping you could give me some pointers.
